actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution calling on the President to initiate multilateral negotiations to create more effective protections against international terrorism.

summary.text: States that the President should initiate multilateral negotiations with other nations toward reaching agreements or treaties to increase the protection of innocent citizens against terrorist acts and to provide economic and political sanctions against those nations refusing to cooperate in the fight against international terrorism. Urges the President to consider proposing a draft agreement or treaty that would provide specified activities to combat terrorism.

titles.title: A joint resolution calling on the President to initiate multilateral negotiations to create more effective protections against international terrorism.
